title: AI Fashion Stylist
description: An intelligent fashion recommendation system that uses computer vision and machine learning to suggest personalized outfit combinations. Built with Python, TensorFlow, and OpenCV for clothing analysis and style recommendations.

title: Serverless E-commerce Platform
description: Built a scalable e-commerce platform using AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, S3, API Gateway, and Amplify. Features include user authentication, product management, shopping cart, and payment processing with Stripe integration.

title: AI-Powered Spam Detection System
description: Developed a machine learning application using SVM, LSTM, and BERT models to classify spam emails with 95% accuracy. Built with Python, TensorFlow, and deployed on AWS SageMaker.

title: Real-time Chat Application
description: Created a real-time chat application using Flutter for mobile and web, with WebSocket connections, Firebase authentication, and cloud functions for backend services.

title: Infrastructure as Code with Terraform
description: Designed and implemented infrastructure as code for multi-environment AWS deployments using Terraform, including VPC, EC2, RDS, and auto-scaling groups with CI/CD pipeline integration.

title: Uber Replica
description: A comprehensive ride-sharing application clone built with modern web technologies. Features include user authentication, real-time location tracking, ride booking, driver matching, and payment processing. Built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB.

title: ML Cloud Deployment Platform
description: A comprehensive machine learning model deployment platform built on cloud infrastructure. Features include automated model training, A/B testing, monitoring, and scalable inference endpoints with real-time performance tracking.

title: Geofences Platform
description: A comprehensive geofencing platform that enables location-based services and notifications. Built with modern web technologies and cloud infrastructure for scalable geofence management and real-time location tracking.
detailedDescription: A full-stack geofencing platform that provides businesses with powerful location-based services. The platform allows users to create, manage, and monitor geofences with real-time notifications and analytics. Features include interactive map visualization, geofence creation tools, real-time location tracking, push notifications, and comprehensive analytics dashboard.
features: Interactive map interface for geofence creation
Push notifications for geofence entry/exit events
Analytics dashboard with geofence performance metrics
User authentication and role-based access control

title: Parz-AI
description: An advanced AI-powered platform that leverages cutting-edge machine learning and natural language processing to provide intelligent automation and decision-making capabilities. Built with modern AI frameworks and cloud infrastructure for scalable AI services.
detailedDescription: Parz-AI is a comprehensive artificial intelligence platform designed to deliver intelligent automation and advanced decision-making capabilities. The platform integrates multiple AI technologies including natural language processing, machine learning models, and predictive analytics to provide businesses with powerful AI-driven solutions. Features include intelligent document processing, automated decision workflows, predictive analytics, and real-time AI insights with comprehensive monitoring and analytics dashboard.
features: RESTful API for AI services integration

title: Portfolio Website
description: This very site, built with Flutter and modern web technologies. Features responsive design, dark/light theme support, and showcases my experience as a Cloud Engineer.
